metadata.name: Galbraith.eth - BRAVE NEW WORLD
metadata.description:
On Nov 7th, 2020, I was invited to talk on a panel with esteemed guests @m1guelpf, @StaniKulechov & @0xKofi.

It was NFTLDN ran by some amazing people, some of which evolved into the awesome @WeAreNFTUK

The subject: ‘The Future of Web3’

At that moment, my life changed forever.

During that talk, I learned so much, but also felt I had a little to give.

I tried to raise a bit of that passion deep within to talk of our future:

- Of the power to do good.  
- Of being excited AND afraid.  
- Of building a better world.

And I think it worked.

It was life changing.

I knew I was onto something, and I knew there was no going back.

Posting the video online it’s on 21k views and still going, and I hope it has helped a few people along the way.

Now I wanted to share this speech with everyone, so mint, and join me, in this BRAVE NEW WORLD.
